mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (num, userId, userName, subject, content, reg_date, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT num, userId, userName, subject, reg_date, hitCount, saveFilename FROM board
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, userId, userName, subject, content, reg_date, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename FROM board WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM board
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM board
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, subject, reg_date, hitCount, saveFilename FROM notice ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
